        public final void printObject(java.lang.Object object,
                              Colour colour)
        Description copied from class: SimpleConsoleUI
        Note: Override me!
        Called when a BaseConsole wants to print something.
        Specified by:
        printObject in class SimpleConsoleUI
        Parameters:
        object - The object that the user wants to print that should be handled
        colour - The colour that the user wants to print the object in. If colour is null, it will be automatically set to the defaultTextColour, however, if you haven't given defaultTextColour a colour be prepared for colour to be null
        See Also:
        SimpleConsoleUI.setDefaultTextColour(com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour), SimpleConsoleUI.getDefaultTextColour()
